entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 06:00 AM EST Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
